entry.tran: 你自己;您自己;你们自己
entry.def: A speaker or writer uses yourself to refer to the person that they are talking or writing to. Yourself is used when the object of a verb or preposition refers to the same person as the subject of the verb.

example.ex: Have the courage to be honest with yourself and about yourself...
example.tran: 要有勇气对自己坦诚，同时对别人也要开诚布公。

example.ex: Your baby depends on you to look after yourself properly while you are pregnant...
example.tran: 你怀孕的时候，你的孩子指望着你好好照顾自己。

entry.tran: （用于强调所指对象）你自己，你本人，你们自己，你们本人
entry.def: You use yourself to emphasize the person that you are referring to.

example.ex: They mean to share the business between them, after you yourself are gone, Sir...
example.tran: 先生，他们两个打算等您本人离开后瓜分这个企业。

example.ex: I've been wondering if you yourselves have any idea why she came.
example.tran: 我一直在想，你们自己是否知道她为什么来。

entry.tran: （代替作宾语的you，用于强调或表示礼貌）你（自己），你们（自己）
entry.def: You use yourself instead of 'you' for emphasis or in order to be more polite when 'you' is the object of a verb or preposition.

example.ex: A wealthy man like yourself is bound to make an enemy or two along the way...
example.tran: 像你这样的有钱人，一路走来注定会结下一两个仇人的。

example.ex: I wouldn't want to cause such important people as yourselves any bother.
example.tran: 我不想给你们这样的大人物添任何麻烦。

Sentence.sentence: If you'd rather hide your actions, that's an indication that you're taking a risk and rationalizing it to yourself.
Evaluating Risks To decide whether a risk is worth taking, you must examine the consequences, in the future as well as right now, negative as well as positive, and to others as well as to yourself.
Get off a stop earlier, make a circuit of the park at lunchtime, walk the child to and from school, get a dog, feel yourself moving in moving air, look, listen, absorb.
Included in your self-image are the categories in which you place yourself, the roles you play and other similar descriptors you use to identify yourself.
On the other hand, rejection occurs when others treat you in a manner that is inconsistent with yourself definition
Rather than relying on how others classify you, consider how you identify yourself.

means.word_mean: 你自己；您自己；你们自己

sentences.en: You must have cut yourself when shaving this morning.
sentences.cn: 你早上刮胡子时一定刮破了。

sentences.en: Look at yourself in the mirror!
sentences.cn: 你在镜子里照照自己吧！
你今天看上去不太舒服。

sentences.en: You have only got to be yourself and they will all love you.
sentences.cn: 你只要表现自然, 他们就都会爱你。
